Reviews.Title: “two weeks stay”
Reviews.Author: Shahpour T
Reviews.Content: worst hotel stayed dirty stained grossed towels torn corners shower dirty cleaned soap left replaced 4 outlets tv couldnt laptop charge phone etc unplugging tv expensive price hotels offered turkish bath massage staff expected requests service stay dont drinks frige cause pay 4 bottle water corner 50 cents smelly hall internet 3 days cause rain recommand hotel worst expensive offer

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, easy reach of attractions.”
Reviews.Author: jhw_11
Reviews.Content: stayed daughter apprehensive reading reviews found hotel adequate staff friendly helpful comfortable showertoilet ok clean cleaned tidied day easy reach istanbuls attractions overall excellent value money paid hesitation staying

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Savur Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Gencturk Cad. Sirvanizade Sok. no.19 | Sehzadebasi, Istanbul, Turkey
